Class Users

java.lang.Object
com.FeedEmGreens.HealthyAura.entity.Users
@Entity public class Users extends Object
Entity representing a user account within the HealthyAura system.

Each Users record stores authentication credentials, contact details, role information, and user-specific preferences. This entity is the central link connecting the authentication, rewards, and review subsystems.

Entries are stored in the users table. User records can represent:

  • Standard users — who can log in, submit reviews, and earn/redeem points.
  • Administrators — who can manage reviews, handle flags, and oversee moderation.

This entity has a one-to-one relationship with Points, linking each user to their reward points record.

Since:
2025-11-07
Version:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Users

      public Users()
      Default constructor required by JPA.

    • Users

      public Users(String username, String email, String password)
      Constructs a new user with the specified username, email, and password.

      By default, the user role is set to USER.

      Parameters:
      username - the user's chosen username
      email - the user's registered email
      password - the user's hashed password

      public void setPoints(Points points)
      Sets the user’s Points record and ensures the bidirectional relationship is maintained by assigning this user back to the Points entity.
